org.universAAL.ri.api.manager

Class RemoteUAAL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.support.utils.UAAL
      • org.universAAL.ri.api.manager.RemoteUAAL

  • public class RemoteUAAL
extends org.universAAL.support.utils.UAAL
    Extension of the Utility API UAAL helper class that adds a few small tweaks to acomodate remote node information.
    Author:
    alfiva

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RemoteUAAL.CListener
      Custom ICListener to be used in the sendC() method of the Utility API.
      class  RemoteUAAL.SListener
      Custom ISListener to be used in the callS() method of the Utility API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteUAAL

        public RemoteUAAL(org.universAAL.middleware.container.ModuleContext context,
                  String node,
                  String remote,
                  String key)
        Basic constructor. Use this one instead of the UAAL one.
        Parameters:
        context - The uAAL context
        node - The client remote node unique identifier
        remote - The client remote node endpoint information.
        key - encryption key to use for GCM, or null if it does not apply

      • createCListener

        public org.universAAL.support.utils.ICListener createCListener(String uri)
        Use this method to create a Listener to be used in the sendC() method of the Utility API, instead of creating it ex profeso.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the context event pattern being used for this listener
        Returns:
        A ICListener

        uri - The URI of the service profile being used for this listener
        Returns:
        A ISListener
